meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cornflower bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of cornflowers for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used a cornflower as a hat.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like cornflowers in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of waving cornflowers.

meanings.definition: A shade of blue resembling the flowers of the cornflower plant.
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a lovely cornflower shade.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed blue and white to create a cornflower hue.
meanings.sent3: The sky turned a cornflower color at sunset.
meanings.sent4: His tie matched the cornflower tones of her dress.
meanings.sent5: The ocean reflected the cornflower sky above.
